attributes.action: stop the process of giving Michael Martin a peerage and such a huge pension
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: stop the process of giving Michael Martin a peerage and such a huge pension bearing in mind that he was forced to resign due to his inability - this is a travesty of justice and a slap in the face to the hard working citizens of this country

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament. http://www.parliament.uk
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
